name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Larry B. SUTTON, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Larry B. SUTTON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Dennis J. Cogan, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Marianne E. Cox, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 333
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Larry B. SUTTON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Dec. 9, 1982.
Decided Dec. 29, 1982.
Dennis J. Cogan, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Marianne E. Cox, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
